global.keywords: GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CLIMATE INDICATORS > ATMOSPHERIC/OCEAN INDICATORS > TEMPERATURE INDICES > GROWING DEGREE DAYS, GEMET:Atmospheric conditions, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global.summary: Sum of degree days above 5 degrees (tas>5ºC) for the period 1991-2020, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. Growing degree days, also called growing degree numbers, are the sum of the heat of the day and are a measure of how good the conditions are for plant growth. The heat sum for a day is defined as the number of degrees the daily average temperature is above a threshold value. Based on daily temperature normals.
global.summary_no: Sum av graddager over 5 grader (tas>5°C) for perioden 1991-2020, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. Vekstgraddager, også kalt vekstgradtall, er døgnet sin varmesum og er et mål på hvor gode forhold det er for planters vekst. Varmesummen til en dag er definert som antall grader døgnmiddeltemperaturen ligger over en terskelverdi. Basert på døgnnormaler for temperatur.
global.title: Annual or seasonal growing degree-days averaged over the period 1991–2020.
global.title_no: vekstgraddager for år eller sesonger, midlet over perioden 1991–2020.

global.summary_no: Sum av graddager under 17 grader (tas<17°C) for perioden 1991-2020, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. Basert på døgnnormaler for temperatur.
global.title: Annual or seasonal energy degree-days averaged over the period 1991–2020.

global.summary: Mean annual maximum snow water equivalent for the period 1991-2020, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. kg m-2 equals mm.
global.summary_no: Gjennomsnittlig årlig maksimal snømengde (mm vann snøen representerer den dagen i året det er maksimalt med snø), for perioden 1991-2020, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. (kg m-2 tilsvarer mm)
global.title_no: Største årlige snømengde for år, midlet over perioden 1991–2020.

global.creator_institution: Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE), Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE)
global.keywords: GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CLIMATE INDICATORS > CRYOSPHERIC INDICATORS > SNOW COVER, GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CRYOSPHERE > SNOW/ICE > SNOW COVER, GEMET:geological / hydrological, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global.summary: Mean annual number of skiing days, for the period 1991-2020, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. Skiing days are defined as days with snow water equivalent more than 60 mm (equals snow depth more than 25 cm when the snow density is 0.25 kg/L).
global.summary_no: Skisesongens lengde, for perioden 1991-2020, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. Skisesong er definerert som gjennomsnittlig antall døgn per år med snøvannekvivalent over 60 mm (tilsvarer snødybde cirka 25 cm, når tettheten settes til 0,25 kg/L).
global.title_no: Skisesongens lengde for år, midlet over perioden 1991–2020.

global.creator_institution: Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE), Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE)
global.keywords: GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CLIMATE INDICATORS > CRYOSPHERIC INDICATORS > SNOW COVER, GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CRYOSPHERE > SNOW/ICE > SNOW COVER, GEMET:geological / hydrological, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global.summary: Mean annual number of ski mountaineering days, for the period 1991-2020, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. Ski mountaineering days are defined as days with snow water equivalent more than 120 mm (equals snow depth more than 50 cm when the snow density is 0.25 kg/L).
global.summary_no: Topptursesongens lengde, for perioden 1991-2020, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. Topptursesong er definert som gjennomsnittlig antall døgn per år med snøvannekvivalent over 120 mm (tilsvarer snødybde cirka 50 cm, når tettheten settes til 0,25 kg/L).
global.title_no: Topptursesongens lengde for år, midlet over perioden 1991–2020.

global.creator_institution: Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE), Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE)
global.keywords: GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CLIMATE INDICATORS > LAND SURFACE/AGRICULTURE INDICATORS > SOIL MOISTURE, GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > LAND SURFACE > SOILS > SOIL MOISTURE/WATER CONTENT, GEMET:Soil Moisture Content, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global.summary: Mean soil moisture content (May, June, July, August and September) for the period 1991-2020, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution.
global.summary_no: Gjennomsnittlig markvannsinnhold (mai, juni, juli, august og september), for perioden 1991-2020, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning.
global.title_no: Markvannsinnhold for sommersesongen (mai til og med september), midlet over perioden 1991–2020.

global.creator_institution: Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE), Norwegian Water Resources and Energy Directorate (NVE)
global.keywords: GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > CLIMATE INDICATORS > LAND SURFACE/AGRICULTURE INDICATORS > DROUGHT DURATION, GCMDSK:EARTH SCIENCE > HUMAN DIMENSIONS > NATURAL HAZARDS > DROUGHTS > DROUGHT DURATION, GEMET:drought, NORTHEMES:Weather and climate
global.summary: Mean drought duration in summer (15. June to 15. October) for the period 1991-2020, at a 1x1 km spatial resolution. Drought duration represents hydrological drought and is defined as number of consecutive days with runoff below the 30th percentile from the flow duration curve for the reference period. The computation is based on smoothed daily runoff using the 11-day moving average procedure.
global.summary_no: Gjennomsnittlig tørkevarighet for 15. juni til 15. oktober, for perioden 1991-2020, for 1x1 km romlig oppløsning. Tørkevarighet representerer hydrologisk tørke og er definert som antall sammenhengende dager med avrenning under 30-persentilen for referanseperioden. Beregningen er basert på 11-dagers glidende midling av daglig avrenning.
global.title_no: Varighet av hydrologisk tørke for 15. juni til 15. oktober, midlet over perioden 1991–2020.
